article: The most positive person I have ever seen is may dad! He is so positive that I do not  _  hearing a single word from him which is related to hopelessness! I can see the reason that he is so positive is because he believes in  _  . And he believes that whatever  _  , it is under control. So we have nothing to worry about. Be positive!
